EXTRACTED VALUE: This series, and this entry in particular, is skating around on charisma alone. [July 2006, p.107]
This is great, but expect repetitive block smashing and item collecting that, in this third LEGO game, has overstayed its welcome.
Some gameplay problems, but its charm and replayability helps to overcome them. [Issue #15]
"NHL 07's" dual-stick control opens a new world of tactics, but NHL 2K7 plays for pure fun and speed. [Nov 2006, p.98]
Legend is the best Tomb Raider game that has yet been made. Despite the game’s few grating problems, that’s quite an accolade. [May 2006, p.102]
